data.title: Ministry of Highways and Infrastructure » SHCA
data.text:
Please be advised that an additional version of the Progressive Estimate Template and Quantity & Cost Sheet has been posted to the Doing Business with the Ministry website to be used on all contracts executed on or after April 1, 2017.

These updates will address recent changes to the PST.

Item Progressive Estimate Template with PST Minor Change, Major Change or New Minor Summary The Progressive Estimate Template has been revised to include the application of PST for contracts executed on or after April 1, 2017.

Item Quantity and Cost Sheet with PST Minor Change, Major Change or New Minor Summary The Quantity and Cost Sheet has been revised to include the application of PST for contracts executed on or after April 1, 2017.

These documents are effective immediately and can be located on the Ministry’s website under Doing Business with MHI.

Make it a habit to always pull a new template off the Ministry website to ensure you have the most current edition of the file.

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:

This email (and any attachment) was intended for a specific recipient(s). It may contain information that is privileged, confidential, or exempt from disclosure. Any privilege that exists is not waived. If you are not the intended recipient, do not copy or distribute it to another person to use it for any other purpose. Please delete it and advise me by return email or telephone. Thank you.
